anya-e0902n0:5: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:6: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ majjhimaṃ nāma nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:7: Pucchā – majjhimanikāyo nāma āvuso mūlapaṇṇāsako majjhima paṇṇāsako uparipaṇṇāsakoti paṇṇāsakavasena tividho, tattha kataraṃ paṇṇāsakaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:8: Vissajjanā – tīsu bhante paṇṇāsakesu mūlapaṇṇāsakaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ dhammasaṃgāhakā mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:9: Pucchā – mūlapaṇṇāsakepi āvuso pañcavaggā paṇṇāsa ca suttāni, tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:10: Vissajjanā – mūlapaṇṇāsake bhante pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyavaggaṃ paṇṇāsakesu ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:11: Sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchāvissajjanakiccāni kātuṃ samārabhāma.
anya-e0902n0:13: Pucchā – tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:14_0: Vissajjanā – ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ bhante pañcasate brāhmaṇakulā pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:14_1: pañcasatā bhante brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā bhikkhū pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ,
anya-e0902n0:15: Pucchā – taṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā katihi vārehi katihi ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:16: Vissajjanā – taṃ pana bhante mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ bhagavatā aṭṭhahi ca vārehi catuvīsatiyā ca antogadhapadehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:18: Pucchā – dutiyaṃ panāvuso sabbāsavasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:19: Vissajjanā – sabbāsavasuttaṃ pana bhante bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:20: Pucchā – tatthāvuso bhagavatā āsavā katihi pakārehi vibhajitvā dassitā.
anya-e0902n0:21: Vissajjanā – sattahi bhante pakārehi vibhajitvā āsavā bhagavatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:23: Pucchā – dhammadāyādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:24: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tadā mahālābhasakkāro udapādi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:25: Pucchā – tatthāvuso dve anusandhayo, tesu paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0902n0:26_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā,
anya-e0902n0:26_1: atthi me tumhesu anukampā, kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādāti
anya-e0902n0:27: Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā, atthi me tumhesu anukampā kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā.
anya-e0902n0:28: Pucchā – dutiye panāvuso anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā kīdisī dhammadesanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:29_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0902n0:29_1: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakānaṃ vivekaṃ ananusikkhataṃ tīhi ṭhānehi gārayutaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:29_2: anusikkhantānañca tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsataṃ, soḷasa ca pāpake dhamme tesañca pahānāya
anya-e0902n0:31: Pucchā – bhayabheravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:32_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0902n0:32_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ye me bho gotama kulaputtā bhavantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:32_2: gotamaṃ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo pubbaṅgamo, bhavaṃ
anya-e0902n0:33: Tesaṃ gotamo bahukāro, bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo samādapetā, bhoto ca pana gotamassa sā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:35: Pucchā – anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:36: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:38: Pucchā – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:39: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:41: Pucchā – vatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:42: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:44: Pucchā – sallekhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:45_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā mahācundo
anya-e0902n0:45_1: bhante bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “yā imā bhante anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke
anya-e0902n0:45_2: uppajjanti, attavādapaṭisaṃyuttā vā lokavādapaṭisaṃyuttā vā, ādimeva nu kho bhante
anya-e0902n0:45_3: bhikkhuno manasikaroto evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ paṭinissaggo
anya-e0902n0:46: Pucchā – tattha ca āvuso kati pariyāyā kati ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:47: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante pañca pariyāyā catucattālīsa ca antogadhapadāni bhagavatā vitthārena bhāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:49: Pucchā – sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:50: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:52: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0902n0:56_0: Pucchā – mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattā dīghanikāye
anya-e0902n0:56_1: ca idha cāti dvīsu nikāyesu porāṇakehi saṃgītikārehi dvikkhattuṃ saṃgāyitvā vitthārena
anya-e0902n0:56_2: patiṭṭhāpitaṃ, taṃ amhehi dīghanikāye yathānuppattavasena pucchitañca vissajjitañca.
anya-e0902n0:56_3: Tathāpi yogāvacarānaṃ bahupakārattāyeva taṃ idānipi yathānuppattavasena puna pucchissāmi,
anya-e0902n0:56_4: taṃ panetaṃ āvuso mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:57: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:58: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha ānāpānassati kāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:59_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato
anya-e0902n0:59_1: vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0902n0:59_2: so satova assasati, satova passasati, dīghaṃ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṃ assasāmī’ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:59_3: dīghaṃ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṃ passasāmī’ti pajānāti, evamādinā bhante tattha ānāpānassati
anya-e0902n0:60: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:61_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito
anya-e0902n0:61_1: vā ṭhitomhīti pajānāti, nisinno vā nisinnomhīti pajānāti, sayāno vā sayānomhīti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:61_2: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā iriyāpathakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:62: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:63_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0902n0:63_1: ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
anya-e0902n0:63_2: sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme
anya-e0902n0:63_3: sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī
anya-e0902n0:63_4: hoti, evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha sampajaññakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:64: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:65_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā
anya-e0902n0:65_1: tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesālomā
anya-e0902n0:65_2: nakhā dantā taco evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanā
anya-e0902n0:66: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:67_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ
anya-e0902n0:67_1: dhātuso paccavekkhati atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu
anya-e0902n0:67_2: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā dhātumanasikārakāyānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:68: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:69_0: Vissajjanā – puna caparaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya
anya-e0902n0:69_1: chaḍḍitaṃ ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ
anya-e0902n0:69_2: so imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati “ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto”ti
anya-e0902n0:69_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā nava sivathikakāyānupassanā bhāvanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:70: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha vedanānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:71_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:71_1: vedayāmī”ti pajānāti, dukkhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “dukkha vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_2: adukkhamasukhaṃ vā vedanaṃ vedayamāno “adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:71_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā vedanānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:72: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cittānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:73_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ “sarāgaṃ citta”nti pajānāti,
anya-e0902n0:73_1: vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ “vītarāgaṃ citta”nti pajānāti, sadosaṃ vā vītadosaṃ vā samohaṃ
anya-e0902n0:73_2: vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkhittaṃ vā cittaṃ “saṃkhittaṃ citta”nti pajānāti, vikkhittaṃ vā
anya-e0902n0:73_3: cittaṃ “vikkhittaṃ citta”nti pajānāti, evamādinā tattha bhagavatā cittānupassanā
anya-e0902n0:74: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha dhammānupassanā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitā, taṃ saṅkhepamatteneva vissajjehi.
anya-e0902n0:75: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati, pañcasu nīvaraṇesu evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā pañcahi pabbehi dhammānupassanā vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:77: Pucchā – cūḷanasīhanādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:78_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante parihīnalābhasakkāre nānātitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:78_1: nānātitthiyā bhante parihīnalābhasakkārā tesu tesu ṭhānesu parideviṃsu, catasso ca
anya-e0902n0:78_2: bhante parisā bhagavato ekamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:80: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:81_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sanukkhatto
anya-e0902n0:81_1: bhante licchaviputto acirapakkanto hoti imasmā dhammavinayā, so vesāliyaṃ parisati
anya-e0902n0:81_2: evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
anya-e0902n0:81_3: takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃ paṭibhānaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:81_4: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito, so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:81_5: etamatthaṃ bhante āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato ārocesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:82_0: Pucchā – kati panāvuso tattha bhagavatā tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:82_1: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:83_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā pakāsitāni,
anya-e0902n0:83_1: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:84_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā catuverajjañāṇāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni, yehi
anya-e0902n0:84_1: vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati,
anya-e0902n0:85_0: Vissajjanā – khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo
anya-e0902n0:85_1: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
anya-e0902n0:85_2: nimittametaṃ sāriputta na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ sāriputta nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
anya-e0902n0:85_3: khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. Evamādinā bhante tattha catuvesārajjañāṇāni
anya-e0902n0:86: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā pañcagatiparicchedañāṇaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:87_0: Vissajjanā – pañca kho imā sāriputta gatiyo, katamā pañca, nirayo tiracchānayoni
anya-e0902n0:87_1: pettivisayo manussā devā, evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ
anya-e0902n0:88: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā aparihāniṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:89_0: Vissajjanā – santi kho pana sāriputta eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino
anya-e0902n0:89_1: yāvadevāyaṃ bhavaṃ puriso daharo hoti, evamādinā bhante tattha tathāgato attano paññāveyyattiyā
anya-e0902n0:91: Pucchā – mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:92_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññatitthiye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā
anya-e0902n0:92_1: bhikkhū etadavocuṃ “samaṇo āvuso gotamo kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti, mayampi kāmānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:92_2: pariññaṃ paññapema, samaṇo āvuso gotamo rūpānaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeti, mayampi
anya-e0902n0:92_3: rūpānaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapema, idha no āvuso ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṃ
anya-e0902n0:92_4: nānākaraṇaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṃ vā yadidaṃ dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:92_5: anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti, etamatthaṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:94: Pucchā – cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:95_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, mahānāmo
anya-e0902n0:95_1: bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:95_2: evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi ‘lobho cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso,
anya-e0902n0:95_3: moho cittassa upakkileso’ti, evañcāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi ‘lobho
anya-e0902n0:95_4: cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso’ti. Atha
anya-e0902n0:95_5: ca pana me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:95_6: tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti
anya-e0902n0:95_7: ‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahino, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:95_8: tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0902n0:97: Pucchā – anumānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:98: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:100: Pucchā – cetokhilasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:101: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:103: Pucchā – vanapatthasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:104: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:106: Pucchā – madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:107_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante daṇḍapāṇiṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, daṇḍapāṇi bhante
anya-e0902n0:107_1: sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kiṃ vādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:109: Pucchā – dvedhāvitakkasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:110: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:112: Pucchā – vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:113: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:115: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kakacūpamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:116_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ moḷiyaphaggunaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:116_1: bhante moḷiyaphagguno bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ativelaṃ saṃsaṭṭho viharati, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:117: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmato moḷiyaphaggunassa taṃ bhagavato ovādaṃ sutvā kathaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, kathañja bhagavā uttari bhikkhūna ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:118_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante moḷiyaphaggunassa bhagavato imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā bhikkhunisaṃsaggato
anya-e0902n0:118_1: oramissāmi viramissāmītipi cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, asaṃvarameva bhante cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:118_2: bhagavā ca bhante ārādhayiṃsu vata me bhikkhave bhikkhū ekaṃ samayaṃ cittaṃ, evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:119: Ubhato daṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:121: Pucchā – alagaddūpamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:122_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:122_1: ariṭṭhassa bhante bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0902n0:122_2: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājādāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0902n0:122_3: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:123: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmato ariṭṭhassa gaddhabādhipubbassa kathaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, kathañca bhagavā uttari bhikkhunaṃ dhammadesanaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0902n0:124_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa “kiñcāpi maṃ
anya-e0902n0:124_1: bhagavā moghapurisavādena vadesi, na kho pana me maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti,
anya-e0902n0:124_2: svāhaṃ ārabhitvā ghaṭṭetvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante cetaso
anya-e0902n0:124_3: parivitakko udapādi, bhagavā ca bhante duppaññassa alagaddūpamaṃ dassetvā alagaddūpamaṃ
anya-e0902n0:124_4: pariyattiñca dassetvā paññavato alagaddūpamāya ca kullūpamāya ca paññavato nissaraṇapariyattiṃ
anya-e0902n0:124_5: dassetvā cha ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni, tesañca channaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ viniveṭhanākāraṃ
anya-e0902n0:124_6: dassetvā pariyosāne ca khandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ arahattanikūṭena dassetvā uttari bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0902n0:126: Pucchā – dhammikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:127_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:127_1: bhante kumārakassapo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vammikapañhaṃ pucchi, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:129: Pucchā – rathavinītasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:130: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena aññamaññaṃ pucchāvissajjanavasena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:132: Pucchā – nivāpasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:133: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:134: Pucchā – imasmiṃ āvuso sutte ko nivāpo ko nevāpiko kā nevāpikaparisā kā migajātā kathañcetissā upamāya attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:135_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante sutte nivāpoti kho bhante pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:135_1: nevāpikoti kho bhante mārassetaṃ pāpimato adhivacanaṃ, nevāpikaparisāti kho bhante
anya-e0902n0:135_2: māraparisāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, migajātāti kho bhante samaṇabrāhmaṇānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:135_3: imasmiṃ bhante sutte etassa attho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0902n0:137: Pucchā – kenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena pāsarāsisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:138_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0902n0:138_1: bhikkhū rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assame bhagavantaṃ ārabbha dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:139: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso tesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sannisinnānaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:140_0: Vissajjanā – sādhu bhikkhave etaṃ kho bhikkhave tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saddhā
anya-e0902n0:140_1: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ, yaṃ tumhe dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdeyyātha, sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:140_2: vo bhikkhave dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo. Dvemā bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:140_3: pariyesanā ariyā ca pariyesanā anariyā ca pariyesanā. Evamādinā bhante bhagavā sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:140_4: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ariyapariyesanañca anariyapariyesanañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:141: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:142_0: Vissajjanā – ahampi sudaṃ bhikkhave pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova
anya-e0902n0:142_1: samāno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi, attanā jarādhammo byādhidhammo
anya-e0902n0:142_2: maraṇadhammo sokadhammo saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesāmi. Evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:142_3: bhante bhagavā attanāpi anariyapariyesanaṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanāya pariyesitabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:143: Pucchā – evaṃ paṭhamābhisambuddhassa āvuso bhagavato ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisinnassa dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa kīdiso
anya-e0902n0:144: Cetaso parivitakko udapādi, kathañca dhammadesanāya cārikā ahosi, kathañca paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:145_0: Vissajjanā – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, ko imaṃ dhammaṃ khippameva
anya-e0902n0:145_1: ājānissatī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ajapālanigrodhamūle
anya-e0902n0:145_2: dhammadesanāya katasanniṭṭhānassa parivitakko udapādi, atha bhante bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ
anya-e0902n0:145_3: yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī, tena padasāyeva cārikaṃ pakkāmi dhammadesanāya,
anya-e0902n0:145_4: dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā, katame dve, yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo
anya-e0902n0:145_5: hīno gāmmo pothujjaniko anariyo anattasaṃhito, evamādinā bhante bhagavato paṭhamā dhammadesanā ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:150: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā pāsarāsiupamāya taṃ desanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:151_0: Vissajjanā – pañcime bhikkhave kāmaguṇā, katame pañca, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā
anya-e0902n0:151_1: kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā. Sotaviññeyyā saddā. Ghānaviññeyyā gandhā.
anya-e0902n0:151_2: Jivhāviññeyyā rasā. Kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā
anya-e0902n0:151_3: rajanīyā. Ime kho bhikkhave pañca kāmaguṇā. Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
anya-e0902n0:151_4: vā ime kāmaguṇe gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā anādīnavadassāvino anissaraṇapaññā paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0902n0:151_5: te evamassu veditabbā “anayamāpannā byāsanamāpannā yathākāmakaraṇīyā pāpimato”, evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:153: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:154_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0902n0:154_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi pilotikena paribbājakena
anya-e0902n0:154_2: saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:155: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ vitthārena paripūretvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:156_0: Vissajjanā – “na kho brāhmaṇa ettāvatā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti, api
anya-e0902n0:156_1: ca brāhmaṇa yathā hatthipadopamo vitthārena paripūro hoti, taṃ suṇāhi sādhukaṃ manasikarohi
anya-e0902n0:156_2: bhāsissāmī”ti, evamādinā bhante bhagavā hatthipadopamaṃ paripūretvā brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇissa desesi.
anya-e0902n0:158: Pucchā – mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:159: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:161: Pucchā – mahāsāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:162: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, devadatto bhante saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā acirapakkanto hoti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:164: Pucchā – cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:165: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante piṅgalakocchaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, piṅgalakoccho bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:167: Pucchā – cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:168: Vissajjanā – nābhike bhante gosiṅgasālavanadāye āyasmatā anuruddhattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:170: Pucchā – mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:171: Vissajjanā – gosiṅgasālavanadāye bhante āyasmatā ca sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:173: Pucchā – mahāgopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:174: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:176: Pucchā – cūḷagopālakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:177: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante ukkacelāyaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:179: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷasaccakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:180_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, saccako nigaṇṭhaputto
anya-e0902n0:180_1: mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:180_2: etadavoca “kathaṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo sāvake vineti, kathaṃ bhāgā ca pana bhoto gotamassa
anya-e0902n0:180_3: sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti, atha bhante bhagavatā aniccavāde ca anattavāde
anya-e0902n0:180_4: ca pakāsite saccako nigaṇṭhaputto pathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attano attavādaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:181: Pucchā – evaṃ āvuso saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena mahāpathavīupamaṃ dassetvā attavāde pakāsite kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ attavādaṃ puna patiṭṭhāpetvā samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:182_0: Vissajjanā – “nanu tvaṃ aggivessana evaṃ vadesi, rūpaṃ me attā, vedanā me attā, saññā
anya-e0902n0:182_1: me attā, saṅkhārā me attā, viññāṇaṃ me attā”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ
anya-e0902n0:182_2: nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ taṃ attavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana bhante bhagavā “tena
anya-e0902n0:182_3: hi aggivessana taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā taṃ byākareyyāsī”ti
anya-e0902n0:182_4: evamādinā bhante bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ samanuyuñji samanugāhi samanubhāsi.
anya-e0902n0:183: Pucchā – evaṃ kho āvuso saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne nisinne dummukho nāma licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
anya-e0902n0:184_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ bhante saccake nigaṇṭhaputte tuṇhībhūte maṅkubhūte pattakkhandhe
anya-e0902n0:184_1: adhomukhe pajjhāyante appaṭibhāne dummukho licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “upamā
anya-e0902n0:185: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, kathañca taṃ bhagavā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:186_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto dummukhaṃ licchaviṃ apasādetvā
anya-e0902n0:186_1: bhagavantaṃ sekhañca asekhañca pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavā ca bhante “idha aggivessana
anya-e0902n0:186_2: mama sāvako yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ
anya-e0902n0:186_3: vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā” evamādinā sekhañca asekhañca
anya-e0902n0:187: Buddho so bhagavā bodhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:188: Danto so bhagavā damathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:189: Santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:190: Tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:191: Parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0902n0:193: Pucchā – mahāsaccakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:194_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante saccakaṃyeva nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Saccako
anya-e0902n0:194_1: bhante nigaṇṭhaputto aparadivase bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato sāvake āsajja
anya-e0902n0:194_2: bhāvanādvayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:195: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajja kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:196_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante bhagavā “kinti pana te aggivessana kāyabhāvanā sutā”ti
anya-e0902n0:196_1: evamādinā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ paṭipucchitvā, kathañca aggivessana abhāvitakāyo
anya-e0902n0:196_2: ca hoti abhāvitacitto ca evamādinā bhāvanādvayaṃ vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:197_0: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ kiṃ vacanaṃ avoca, kathañca
anya-e0902n0:197_1: bhagavā padhānakāle attanāanubhūtapubbā paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo pakāsesi,
anya-e0902n0:197_2: yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:198_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “na hi nūna
anya-e0902n0:198_1: bhoto gotamassa uppajjati, tathā rūpā sukhāvedanā, yathārūpā uppannā sukhāvedanā
anya-e0902n0:198_2: cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya, na hi nūna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathārūpā dukkhā
anya-e0902n0:198_3: vedanā, yathārūpā uppannā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā”ti atha kho bhagavā
anya-e0902n0:198_4: “kiñhi no siyā aggivessana, idha me aggivessena pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa
anya-e0902n0:198_5: bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi, evamādinā bhante bhagavā padhānakāle attanānubhūtapubbā
anya-e0902n0:198_6: paramukkaṃsagatā sukhadukkhavedanāyo vitthārena, yāpi bhagavato cittaṃ na pariyādāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:200: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:201_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sakko bhante
anya-e0902n0:201_1: devānamindo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “kittāvatānukho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena
anya-e0902n0:201_2: taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosāno
anya-e0902n0:201_3: seṭṭho devamanussāna”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:202: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhu saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti accantaniṭṭho accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyāsāno seṭṭho devamanussānaṃ –
anya-e0902n0:204: Pucchā – mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:205_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ kevaṭṭaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sātissa
anya-e0902n0:205_1: bhante bhikkhuno kevaṭṭaputtassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:205_2: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati
anya-e0902n0:206: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā ca paṭipucchitvā ca anattabhāvadīpikaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:207_0: Vissajjanā – atha bhante bhagavā bhikkhū “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, apināyaṃ sāti
anya-e0902n0:207_1: bhikkhu kevaṭṭaputto usmīkatopi ismiṃ dhammavinaye”ti āmantetvā, tumhepi me bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:207_2: evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāthatyādinā bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ca yaṃ yadeva bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:207_3: paccayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ, tena teneva viññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_4: cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0902n0:207_5: evamādinā bhante anattatādīpikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:209: Pucchā – mahāassapurasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:210_0: Vissajjanā – aṅgesu bhante assapure nāma aṅgānaṃ nigame bahū manusse saddhe pasanne
anya-e0902n0:210_1: ārabbbha bhāsitaṃ. Bahū bhante manussā saddhā pasannā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:210_2: sabbakālañca ratanattayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vaṇṇakathaṃyeva kathayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:211: Pucchā – katame āvuso tattha bhagavatā dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:212_1: parisuddhājīvo indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojanemattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ
anya-e0902n0:212_2: nīvaraṇappahānaṃ cattāri ca jhānāni tisso ca vijjā ime kho bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:212_3: samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā ca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītā dhammā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:214: Pucchā – cūḷaassapurasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā katta kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:215: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante assapure nigame teyeva manusse saddhe pasanne ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, tasmiṃyeva bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:216: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca assamaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:217_0: Vissajjanā – “kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu na samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
anya-e0902n0:217_1: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā appahīnā hoti, byāpannacittassa
anya-e0902n0:217_2: byāpādo appahīno hotī”ti evamādinā ca. Kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadaṃ
anya-e0902n0:217_3: paṭipanno hoti, yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīnā hoti,
anya-e0902n0:217_4: byāpannacittassa byāpādo pahīno hoti evamādinā ca bhante bhagavatā tattha samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā
anya-e0902n0:217_5: ca assamaṇasāmīcippaṭipadā ca vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0902n0:219: Pucchā – sāleyyakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:220_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante sālāyaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāme sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike
anya-e0902n0:220_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sāleyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ
anya-e0902n0:220_2: “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0902n0:220_3: maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti, ko pana bho gotama hetu ko
anya-e0902n0:220_4: paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:222: Pucchā – verañjakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:223_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante verañjake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Verañjakā
anya-e0902n0:223_1: bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ “ko nu kho bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:223_2: hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ
anya-e0902n0:223_3: vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti, ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce
anya-e0902n0:223_4: sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:225: Pucchā – mahāvedallasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:226: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā mahākoṭṭhikena puṭṭhena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:228: Pucchā – cūḷavedallasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:229: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante visākhena upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya theriyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:231: Pucchā – cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:232: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:234: Pucchā – mahādhammasamādānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:235: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:237: Pucchā – vīmaṃsakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:238: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:240: Pucchā – kosambiyasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:241_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante kosambike bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kosambikā bhante
anya-e0902n0:241_1: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
anya-e0902n0:243: Pucchā – brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:244: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:246: Pucchā – māratajjanīyasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:247_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena
anya-e0902n0:247_1: māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa
anya-e0902n0:247_2: kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:250: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kandarakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:251_0: Vissajjanā – campāyaṃ bhante gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre pessañca hatthārohaputtaṃ
anya-e0902n0:251_1: kandarakañca paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, kandarako bhante paribbājako bhagavato
anya-e0902n0:251_2: ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, pesso ca bhante hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca
anya-e0902n0:251_3: dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:252_0: Pucchā – evaṃ kho āvuso kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca
anya-e0902n0:252_1: abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite kathaṃ bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā dhammadesanārambhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:252_2: ārabhi, kathañca pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato ca dhammadesanāya ca vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
anya-e0902n0:252_3: kathañca pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:253_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ kho bhante kandarakena paribbājakena bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0902n0:253_1: ca abhippasannena vaṇṇe bhāsite “evametaṃ kandaraka evametaṃ kandaraka” evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:253_2: bhagavā taṃ samanujānitvā “santi hi kandaraka bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto
anya-e0902n0:253_3: khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā
anya-e0902n0:253_4: sammadaññā vimuttā”ti evamādinā dhammadesanaṃ samārabhi. Atha kho bhante pesso hatthārohaputto
anya-e0902n0:253_5: “acchariyaṃ bhante abbhutaṃ bhante yāva supaññattā cime bhante bhagavatā cattāro
anya-e0902n0:253_6: satipaṭṭhānā sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:253_7: atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavato
anya-e0902n0:253_8: ca dhammadesanāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, bhagavāpi bhante “gahanañhetaṃ pessa yadidaṃ manussā,
anya-e0902n0:253_9: uttānakañhetaṃ pessa yadidaṃ pasavo”tiādinā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
anya-e0902n0:254_0: Pucchā – taṃ panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa kīdiso ānisaṃso
anya-e0902n0:254_1: adhigato, kathañca bhagavā taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0902n0:255_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kho pana bhante dhammaṃ sutvā pessassa hatthārohaputtassa dve ānisaṃsā
anya-e0902n0:255_1: adhigatā saṅghe ca pasādo satipaṭṭhānapariggahaṇūpāyo ca abhinavo. Bhagavā ca bhante
anya-e0902n0:255_2: taṃ puggalacatukkadesanaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto”tiādinā
anya-e0902n0:255_3: saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ, vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattaṃ. Vitthārena vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:257: Pucchā – aṭṭhakanāgarasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:258_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante veḷuvagāmake gahapatiṃ aṭṭhakanāgaraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0902n0:258_1: ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Dasamo bhante gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro
anya-e0902n0:258_2: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “atthi nu kho bhante ānanda tena bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:258_3: jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto, yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa
anya-e0902n0:258_4: ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṃ vimuccati, aparikkhiṇā ca āsavā
anya-e0902n0:258_5: parikkhayaṃ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ anupāpuṇātī”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:260: Pucchā – sekhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:261_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ santhāgāre āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena
anya-e0902n0:261_1: kāpilavatthave sakye ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhagavā bhante kāpilavatthave sakye bahudevarattiṃ
anya-e0902n0:261_2: dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ
anya-e0902n0:261_3: āmantesi “paṭibhātu taṃ ānanda kāpilavatthavānaṃ sakyānaṃ sekho pāṭipado, piṭṭhi
anya-e0902n0:261_4: me āgilāyati, tamahaṃ āyamissāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:263: Pucchā – potaliyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:264_0: Vissajjanā – aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame potaliyaṃ gahapatiṃ
anya-e0902n0:264_1: paṭikkhittasabbakammantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Potaliyo bhante gahapati paṭikkhittasabbakammanto
anya-e0902n0:264_2: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamanto bhagavatā gahapativādena samudācariyamāno
anya-e0902n0:264_3: kupito anattamano bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “tayidaṃ bho gotama nacchannaṃ tayidaṃ nappatirūpaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:264_4: yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ gahapativādena samudācarasī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:265: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ vitthārena pakāsetvā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedaṃ dassesi.
anya-e0902n0:266_0: Vissajjanā – atha bhante bhagavā ariyassa vinaye vohārasamucchedāya aṭṭha dhamme
anya-e0902n0:266_1: vibhajitvā “seyyathāpi gahapati kukkuro jighacchādubbalyapareto goghātakasūnaṃ paccupaṭṭhito
anya-e0902n0:266_2: assa” evamādinā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā pariyosāne tīhi vijjāhi ariyassa vinaye
anya-e0902n0:266_3: vohārasamucchedaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ vohārasamucchedaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0902n0:268: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena jīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:269_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Jīvako bhante
anya-e0902n0:269_1: komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
anya-e0902n0:269_2: uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti, taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati
anya-e0902n0:269_3: paṭicca kammanti. Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhanti,
anya-e0902n0:269_4: taṃ samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissa kataṃ maṃsaṃ paribhuñjati paṭicca kamma’nti, kacci
anya-e0902n0:269_5: te bhante bhagavato vuttavādino na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti, dhammassa
anya-e0902n0:269_6: cānudhammaṃ byākaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
anya-e0902n0:271: Pucchā – upālisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:272_0: Vissajjanā – nāḷandāyaṃ bhante upāliṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Upāli bhante gahapati
anya-e0902n0:272_1: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “āgamā nukhvidha bhante dīghatapassī nigaṇṭho”ti,
anya-e0902n0:272_2: evamādinā ca bhante upāli gahapati bhagavato paṭisandhāraṃ katvā attano ācariyassa
anya-e0902n0:272_3: nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa vādaṃ pakāsesi, vādaṃ vaṇṇesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:273: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ tasmiṃ vāde kathaṃ samanuyuñjī samanugāhī samanubhāsī, kathañcassa upāyaṃ dassetvā yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:274_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante bhagavā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ “sace kho tvaṃ gahapati sacce
anya-e0902n0:274_1: patiṭṭhāya manteyyāsi, siyā no ettha kathāsallāpo”ti upāliṃ gahapatiṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0902n0:274_2: “taṃ kiṃmaññasi gahapati, idhassa nigaṇṭho ābādhiko dukkhito bāñhagilāno sītodakaparikkhitto
anya-e0902n0:274_3: uṇhodakapaṭisevī, so sītodakaṃ alabhamāno kālaṅkareyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavā
anya-e0902n0:274_4: cattāro upāye dassetvā upāliṃ gahapatiṃ yathābhūtamatthaṃ ñāpesi.
anya-e0902n0:275: Pucchā – evaṃ kho āvuso upāli gahapati bhagavatā saññāpito imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi, kathañca bhagavā taṃ puna anusāsitvā uttari vinesi.
anya-e0902n0:276_0: Vissajjanā – “purimenevāhaṃ bhante opammena bhagavato attamano abhiraddho, apicāhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:276_1: imāni bhagavato vicitrāni pañhapaṭibhānāni sotukāmo, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paccanīkaṃ
anya-e0902n0:276_2: kātabbaṃ amaññissa”nti, evamādinā bhante upāli gahapati bhagavatā viññāpito imasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:276_3: dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāraṃ akāsi. Tattha bhagavā ca bhante “anuviccakāraṃ
anya-e0902n0:276_4: kho gahapati karohi, anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ ñātamanussānaṃ sādhu hotī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:276_5: puna anusāsitvā uttari yāva dhammacakkhupaṭilābhā vinesi.
anya-e0902n0:277: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upālissa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā āvīmaṃsanā ca upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarā kathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:278_0: Vissajjanā – “ummattosi tvaṃ gahapati dattosi tvaṃ gahapatī”ti evamādinā bhante nigaṇṭhassa
anya-e0902n0:278_1: nāṭaputtassa upālissa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsā ca “bhaddikā bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyā
anya-e0902n0:278_2: kalyāṇī bhante āvaṭṭanīmāyāti” evamādinā upālissa gahapatissa paccuttarakathā ca ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:298: Pucchā – kukkuravatikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:299_0: Vissajjanā – koliyesu bhante haliddavasane nāma koliyānaṃ nigame puṇṇañca koliyaputtaṃ
anya-e0902n0:299_1: govatikaṃ acelañca seniyaṃ kukkuravatikaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Puṇṇo bhante koliya putto
anya-e0902n0:299_2: govatiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko dukkarakārako
anya-e0902n0:299_3: chamānikkhittaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, tassa taṃ kukkuravataṃ dīgharattaṃ samattaṃ samādinnaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:299_4: tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:301: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhayarājakumārasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:302_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe me bhante abhayaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Abhayo bhante
anya-e0902n0:302_1: rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “bhāseyya nu kho bhante tathāgato
anya-e0902n0:302_2: taṃ vācaṃ, yā sā vācā paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:304: Pucchā – bahuvedanīyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:305_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantañca udāyiṃ pañcakaṅgañca thapatiṃ ārabbha
anya-e0902n0:305_1: bhāsitaṃ, pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ upasaṅkamitvā vedanaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:305_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ etadavoca “tisso kho thapati vedanā vuttā
anya-e0902n0:305_3: bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti. Evaṃ vutte bhante
anya-e0902n0:305_4: pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca “na kho bhante udāyi tisso vedanā
anya-e0902n0:305_5: vuttā bhagavatā, dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā, yāyaṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:305_6: adukkhamasukhā vedanā, santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti. Neva asakkhi
anya-e0902n0:305_7: kho bhante āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ saññāpetuṃ, na pana asakkhi pañcakaṅgo
anya-e0902n0:305_8: thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ saññāpetuṃ. Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato udāyissa
anya-e0902n0:305_9: pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ, atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando
anya-e0902n0:305_10: yāvatako ahosi āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo, taṃ
anya-e0902n0:305_11: sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:307: Pucchā – apaṇṇakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:308_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante sālāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike
anya-e0902n0:308_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulā bhante aññatitthiyā sāleyyakānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:308_2: attano attano micchādiṭṭhiyo paṭiggaṇhāpesuṃ uggaṇhāpesuṃ. Te pana bhante sāleyyakā
anya-e0902n0:308_3: brāhmaṇagahapatikā ekadiṭṭhiyampi patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:309: Pucchā – tatra āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo ca sammāvādo ca kathaṃ vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:310_0: Vissajjanā – tatra bhante bhagavatā “santi gahapatayo eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino
anya-e0902n0:310_1: evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:310_2: phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā paṭhamaṃ micchāvādo ca sammāvādo ca vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:311: Pucchā – tattha āvuso bhagavatā micchāvādīnañca doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo kathaṃ vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:312_0: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante bhagavatā “tatra gahapatayo yete samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino
anya-e0902n0:312_1: evaṃdiṭṭhino natthi dinnaṃ natthi yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:312_2: phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā bhante micchāvādīnañca doso sammāvādīnañca guṇo bhagavatā vicāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:313: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:314: Vissajjanā – tatra gahapatayo viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā viññuno purisapuggalassa paṭisañcikkhaṇā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:315: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavatā aññesupi micchāvādasammāvādesu apaṇṇakapaṭipadā vicāretvā pakāsitā, taṃ saṅkhepato kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:316_0: Vissajjanā – yatheva bhante paṭhame vāde, evameva kho bhante akiriyavādādīsu catūsu
anya-e0902n0:316_1: ca micchāvādesu dosaṃ kiriyavādādīsu ca catūsu sammāvādesu guṇaṃ, tattha ca viññuno
anya-e0902n0:316_2: purisassa paṭisañcikkhaṇākāraṃ dassetvā bhagavatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:318: Pucchā – ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:319: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:321: Pucchā – mahārāhulovādasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:322_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0902n0:322_1: rāhulo bhagavato ceva attano ca attabhāvasampattiṃ nissāya gehassitaṃ chandarāgaṃ
anya-e0902n0:324: Pucchā – cūḷamālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:325_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:325_1: bhante mālukyaputto attano pavivittassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa cetaso parivitakkaṃ
anya-e0902n0:325_2: bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:327: Pucchā – mahāmālukyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:328: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahāmālukyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:330: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhaddālisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:331_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ bhaddāliṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0902n0:331_1: bhaddāli bhagavatā sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:332_0: Accayo maṃ bhante accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yohaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:332_1: sikkhāpade paññāpiyamāne bhikkhusaṅghe sikkhaṃ samādiyamāne anussāhaṃ pavedesiṃ,
anya-e0902n0:332_2: tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāya –
anya-e0902n0:333: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, kathañcassa bhagavā taṃ vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:334_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu, ko paccayo,
anya-e0902n0:334_1: yena midhekaccaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasayu pasayu kāraṇaṃ karontī”ti evamādinā bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:334_2: pañhaṃ apucchi. Bhagavā ca bhante “idha bhaddāli ekacco bhikkhu abhiṇhāpattiko hoti,
anya-e0902n0:334_3: āpattibahulo” evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:335: Pucchā – tadāpi kho āvuso āyasmā bhaddāli punapi bhagavantaṃ kīdisaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, kathañcassa bhagavā tampi vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:336_0: Vissajjanā – tadāpi bhante āyasmā bhaddāli “ko nu kho bhante hetu, ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0902n0:336_1: pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ, bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahiṃsu.
anya-e0902n0:336_2: Ko pana bhante hetu, ko paccayo yena etarahi bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti appatarā
anya-e0902n0:336_3: ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti bhagavantaṃ punapi pañhaṃ apucchi. Bhagavā ca bhante
anya-e0902n0:336_4: “evametaṃ bhaddāli hoti, sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni
anya-e0902n0:336_5: honti appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇḍahantī”ti, evamādinā āyasmato bhaddālissa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākatā.
anya-e0902n0:338: Pucchā – laṭukikopamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:339_0: Vissajjanā – aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ
anya-e0902n0:339_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante udāyī bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “idha mayhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:339_2: bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bahūnaṃ vata no
anya-e0902n0:339_3: bhagavā dukkhadhammānaṃ apahattā, bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ upahattā,
anya-e0902n0:339_4: bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ apahattā, bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā kusalānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:339_5: dhammānaṃ upahattā’ti”. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:340: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso bhagavā kīdisī upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:341: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante bhagavā laṭukikopamaṃ hatthināgopamaṃ daliddapurisopamaṃ gahapatikopamanti catasso upamāyo dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:342: Pucchā – evañcāvuso bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā kathaṃ uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:343_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā catūhi upamāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā “cattāro
anya-e0902n0:343_1: me udāyi puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ”nti evamādinā uttari bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:345: Pucchā – cātumasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:346_0: Vissajjanā – cātumāyaṃ bhante āyasmantānaṃ sāriputtamoggalānattherānaṃ saddhivihārike
anya-e0902n0:346_1: adhunā pabbajite sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni
anya-e0902n0:346_2: bhante pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṃ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya,
anya-e0902n0:346_3: te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā
anya-e0902n0:346_4: pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:347: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:348: Vissajjanā – cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni udakorohante pātikaṅkhitabbānīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:350: Pucchā – naḷakapānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:351: Vissajjanā – naḷakapāne bhante anuruddhattherappamukhe sambahule abhiññāte abhiññāte kulaputte ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:353: Pucchā – goliyānisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:354_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ goliyāniṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0902n0:354_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante goliyāni āraññiko padasamācāro saṅghamajjhe
anya-e0902n0:354_2: osaṭo hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:356: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kīṭāgirisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:357_0: Vissajjanā – kāsīsu bhante kīṭāgirismiṃ kāsīnaṃ nigame assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū
anya-e0902n0:357_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā
anya-e0902n0:357_2: evamāhaṃsu “mayaṃ kho āvuso sāyañceva bhuñjāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle, te mayaṃ sāyañceva
anya-e0902n0:357_3: bhuñjamānā pāto ca divā ca vikāle appābādhatañca sañjānāma appātaṅkatañca lahuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0902n0:357_4: balañca phāsuvihārañca, te mayaṃ kiṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ hitvā kālikaṃ anudhāvissāma, sāyañceva
anya-e0902n0:357_5: mayaṃ bhuñjissāma pāto ca divā ca vikāle”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:359: Pucchā – tevijjavacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:360_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto
anya-e0902n0:360_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ me bhante samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū
anya-e0902n0:360_2: sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti, carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa
anya-e0902n0:360_3: ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti. Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu
anya-e0902n0:360_4: “samaṇo gotamo sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti, carato ca
anya-e0902n0:360_5: me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita”nti.
anya-e0902n0:360_6: Kacci te bhante bhagavato vuttavādino, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti,
anya-e0902n0:360_7: dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:362: Pucchā – aggivacchasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:363_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto bhante
anya-e0902n0:363_1: paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ nu kho bho gotama ‘sassato loko idameva
anya-e0902n0:363_2: saccaṃ moghamañña’nti evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavaṃ gotamo”ti evamādikaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:365: Pucchā – mahāvacchasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:366_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante vacchagottaṃyeva paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto
anya-e0902n0:366_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “dīgharattāhaṃ bhotā gotamena
anya-e0902n0:366_2: sahakathī, sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo saṃkhittena kusalākusalaṃ desetū”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:367: Pucchā – evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vacchagotto paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi, kathañcassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:368_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte bhante vacchagotto paribbājako “sace hi bho gotama imaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0902n0:368_1: bhavaṃyeva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, no ca kho bhikkhū ārādhakā abhavissaṃsu, evamidaṃ
anya-e0902n0:368_2: brahmacariyaṃ aparipūraṃ abhavissa tenaṅgenā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno
anya-e0902n0:370: Pucchā – dīghanakhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:371_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante dīghanakhaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Dīghanakho
anya-e0902n0:371_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama evaṃvādī
anya-e0902n0:371_2: evaṃdiṭṭhi sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:372: Pucchā – imasmiṃ ca panāvuso veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne kesaṃ puggalānaṃ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:373_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato sāriputtassa
anya-e0902n0:373_1: anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci, dīghanakhassa pana paribbājakassa tasmiṃyeva āsane
anya-e0902n0:373_2: virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti.
anya-e0902n0:375: Pucchā – māgaṇḍiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:376_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame bhāradvāja gottassa
anya-e0902n0:376_1: brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake māgaṇḍiyaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māgaṇḍiyo
anya-e0902n0:376_2: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ “bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo”ti vadesi, tasmiṃ bhante vaṭṭhusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:377: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:378_0: Vissajjanā – “cakkhuṃ kho māgaṇḍiya rūpārataṃ rūpasammuditaṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa dantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:378_1: guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ, tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:378_2: tattha bhagavā māgaṇḍiyassa paribbājakassa samanuyuñjitvā samanuyuñjitvā dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0902n0:379: Pucchā – evaṃ kho āvuso māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena “nakiñci bho gotamā”ti yathābhūtaṃ paṭissute kathaṃ bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi vattabbataṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:380_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ kho bhante māgaṇḍiyena paribbājakena nakiñci bhogotamāti yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0902n0:380_1: paṭissute “ahaṃ kho pana māgaṇḍiya pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito
anya-e0902n0:380_2: samaṅgībhūto paricāresiṃ cakkhuviññeyyahi rūpehi iṭṭhehi manāpehi piyarūpehi kāmūpasaṃhitehi
anya-e0902n0:380_3: rajanīyehī”ti evamādinā bhagavā attanopi na kiñci kenacipi vattabbataṃ pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:381: Pucchā – imasmiṃ sutte pariyosānapucchaṃ pucchissāmi imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:382_0: Vissajjanā – imaṃ ca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako ‘abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:382_1: bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:384: Pucchā – sandakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:385_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante sandakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0902n0:385_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Sandako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0902n0:385_2: “sādhuvata bhavantaṃyeva ānandaṃ paṭibhātu sake ācariya ke dhammikathā”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:386: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:387_0: Vissajjanā – idha sandaka ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi natthi dinnaṃ, natthi
anya-e0902n0:387_1: yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃvipāko, natthi ayaṃloko,
anya-e0902n0:387_2: natthi paroloko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikāti
anya-e0902n0:388: Evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena cattāro abrahmacariyavāsā vicāretvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:389: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha cattāri anassāsikāni brahmacariyāni āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena vicāretvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:390_0: Vissajjanā – idha sandaka ekacco satthā sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:390_1: paṭijānāti “carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:390_2: paccupaṭṭhita”nti evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena
anya-e0902n0:392: Kho āvuso sandako paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ kathaṃ pucchi, tathañcassāyasmānandatthero byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:393_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante sandako paribbājako “so pana bho ānanda satthā kiṃvādī
anya-e0902n0:393_1: kiṃ akkhāyī”ti evamādinā āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi, āyasmā ca bhante ānandatthero
anya-e0902n0:393_2: “idha sandaka tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti
anya-e0902n0:393_3: evamādinā sandakassa paribbājakassa vibhajitvā vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:394: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:395_0: Vissajjanā – imañca bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sandako paribbājako “acchariyaṃ bho
anya-e0902n0:395_1: ānanda, abbhutaṃ bho ānanda, na ca nāma sadhammokkaṃsanā bhavissati, na paradhammavambhanā,
anya-e0902n0:395_2: āyatane ca dhammadesanā, tāva bahukā ca niyyātāro paññāyissantī”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:397: Pucchā – mahāsakuludāyisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:398_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sakuludāyiṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sakuludāyī
anya-e0902n0:398_1: bhante paribbājako purimāni divasāni purimatarāni kotūhalasālāyaṃ nānātitthiyānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:398_2: samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yāvatako ahosi bhagavantañca cha ca satthāro ārabbha kathāsallāpo,
anya-e0902n0:398_3: taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:400: Pucchā – samaṇamuṇḍikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:401_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante uggāhamāna paribbājakaṃ samaṇamuṇḍikāputtaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0902n0:401_1: bhāsitaṃ. Uggāhamāno bhante paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto pañcakaṅgaṃ tapatiṃ etadavoca
anya-e0902n0:401_2: “catūhi kho ahaṃ gahapati dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññapemi sampannakusalaṃ
anya-e0902n0:401_3: paramakusalaṃ uttamapattipattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjha”nti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:403: Pucchā – cūḷasakuludāyīsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:404_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sakuludāyiṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sakuludāyī
anya-e0902n0:404_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yadāhaṃ bhante imaṃ parisaṃ anupasaṅkanto
anya-e0902n0:404_2: homi, athāyaṃ parisā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathenti nisinnā hoti. Yadā ca
anya-e0902n0:404_3: kho ahaṃ bhante imaṃ parisaṃ upasaṅkamanto homi, athāyaṃ parisā mamaññeva mukhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:404_4: ullokentī nisinnā hoti ‘yaṃ no samaṇo udāyī dhammaṃ bhāsissati, taṃ sossāmā’ti, yadā
anya-e0902n0:404_5: pana bhante bhagavā imaṃ parisaṃ upasaṅkanto hoti, athāhañceva ayañca parisā bhagavato
anya-e0902n0:404_6: mukhaṃ ullokentā nisinnā homa yaṃ no bhagavā dhammaṃ bhāsissati, taṃ sossāmā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:406: Pucchā – vekhanasasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:407_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante vekhanasaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, vekhanaso
anya-e0902n0:407_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavato santike udānaṃ udānesi “ayaṃ paramo vaṇṇo ayaṃ paramo
anya-e0902n0:409: Pucchā – ghaṭikārasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:410_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa gharavatthupadese āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:410_1: ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhagavā bhante tasmiṃ bhūmipadese sitaṃ pātvākāsi, āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:410_2: ca ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa
anya-e0902n0:410_3: pātukammāya, na akāraṇena tathāgatā sitaṃ pātukarontī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:412: Pucchā – raṭṭhapālasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:413_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante rājānaṃ korabyaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā raṭṭhapālattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:413_1: Rājā bhante korabyo āyasmantaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ etadavoca “cattārimāni bho raṭṭhapāla
anya-e0902n0:413_2: pārijuññāni, yehi pārijuññehi samannāgatā idhekacce kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni
anya-e0902n0:413_3: vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anāgāriyaṃ pabbajantī”ti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:414: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero rañño korabyassa kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:415_0: Vissajjanā – atha kho bhante āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero “taṃ kiṃ maññasi mahārāja tvaṃ
anya-e0902n0:415_1: vīsativassuddesikopi paṇṇavīsativassuddesikopi hatthismimpi katāvī assasmimpi katāvī
anya-e0902n0:415_2: rathasmimpi katāvī dhanusmimpi katāvī tharusmimpi katāvī ūrubalī bāhubalī alamatto
anya-e0902n0:415_3: saṅgāmāvacaro”ti evamādinā paṭhamaṃ dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:416: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero rañño korabyassa dutiyampi dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:417: Vissajjanā – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi mahārāja, atthi te koci anusāyiko ābādho”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā raṭṭhapālo rañño korabyassa dutiyaṃ dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:418: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero rañño korabyassa tatiyampi dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:419_0: Vissajjanā – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi mahārāja, yathā tvaṃ etarahi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito
anya-e0902n0:419_1: samaṅgībhūto paricāresi, lacchasi tvaṃ paratthāpi evamevāhaṃ imeheva pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
anya-e0902n0:419_2: samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāremī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā raṭṭhapālo rañño korabyassa
anya-e0902n0:420: Pucchā – catutthampi kho āvuso dhammuddesaṃ āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero rañño korabyassa kathaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:421: Vissajjanā – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi mahārāja, phītaṃ kuruṃ ajjhāvasasī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā raṭṭhapālatthero rañño korabyassa catutthaṃ dhammuddesaṃ vitthāretvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:423: Pucchā – maghadevasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:424_0: Vissajjanā – mithilāyaṃ bhante maghadevaambavane āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:424_1: Bhagavā bhante aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0902n0:424_2: “ko nu kho bhante ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya, na akāraṇena tathāgatā
anya-e0902n0:424_3: sitaṃ pātukarontī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:426: Pucchā – madhurasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:427_0: Vissajjanā – madhurāyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ mādhuraṃ avantiputtaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā mahākaccānattherena
anya-e0902n0:427_1: bhāsitaṃ, rājā bhante mādhuro avantiputto āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca “brahmaṇā
anya-e0902n0:427_2: bho kaccāna evamāhaṃsu brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo. Brāhmaṇova sukko
anya-e0902n0:427_3: vaṇṇo, kaṇho añño vaṇṇo. Brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti, no abrāhmaṇā. Brāhmaṇāva brahmuno
anya-e0902n0:427_4: puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanimmitā brahmadāyādāti. Idha bhavaṃ kaccāno
anya-e0902n0:429: Pucchā – bodhirājakumārasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:430_0: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bodhiṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bodhi
anya-e0902n0:430_1: bhante rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mayaṃ kho bhante evaṃ hoti. Na kho sukhena
anya-e0902n0:430_2: sukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ, dukkhena kho sukhaṃ adhigantabba”nti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:431: Pucchā – evaṃ vutte kho āvuso bodhi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kathaṃ pucchi, kathañcassa bhagavā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:432_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte bhante bodhirājakumāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīva cirena
anya-e0902n0:432_1: nu kho bhante bhikkhu tathāgataṃ vināyakaṃ labhamāno yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva
anya-e0902n0:432_2: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
anya-e0902n0:432_3: sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyā”ti, bhagavā ca bhante “tena hi rājakumāra
anya-e0902n0:432_4: taṃyevettha paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti, evamādinā vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:433: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bodhirājakumāro imissaṃ dhammadesanāyaṃ pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:434_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bodhirājakumāro “aho buddho aho
anya-e0902n0:434_1: dhammo aho dhammassa svākkhātatā, yatra hi nāma sāyamanusiṭṭho, pāto visesaṃ adhigamissati,
anya-e0902n0:434_2: pātamanusiṭṭho sāyaṃ visesaṃ adhigamissatī”ti evamādinā imissaṃ dhammadesanāyaṃ pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:436: Pucchā – aṅgulimālasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:437_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0902n0:437_1: bhante aṅgulimālatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idhāhaṃ bhante pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā
anya-e0902n0:437_2: pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ, addasaṃ kho ahaṃ bhante sāvatthiyaṃ
anya-e0902n0:437_3: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno aññataraṃ itthiṃ mūḷhagabbhaṃ vighātagabbhaṃ disvāna mayhaṃ
anya-e0902n0:437_4: etadahosi “kilissanti vata bho sattā, kilissanti vata bho sattā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:439: Pucchā – piyajātikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:440_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ
anya-e0902n0:440_1: bhante aññatarassa gahapatissa ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato hoti, tassa kālaṃ
anya-e0902n0:440_2: kiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti, so āḷāhanaṃ gantvā kandati
anya-e0902n0:440_3: “kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtakā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:442: Pucchā – bāhitika suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:443_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0902n0:443_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Rājā bhante pasenadi kosalo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0902n0:443_2: “kiṃ nu kho bhante ānanda sobhagavā tathārūpaṃ kāyasamācāraṃ samācareyya, yvassa
anya-e0902n0:443_3: kāyasamācāro opārambho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:445: Pucchā – dhammacetiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:446: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante medāḷupe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame raññā pasenadinā kosalena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:448: Pucchā – kaṇṇakatthalasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:449: Vissajjanā – uruññāyaṃ bhante kaṇṇakatthale migadāye raññā pasenadinā kosalena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:451: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena brahmāyusuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:452_0: Vissajjanā – videhesu bhante mithilāyaṃ maghadevaambavane brahmāyuṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0902n0:452_1: bhāsitaṃ. Brahmāyu bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhapañhāni pucchi,
anya-e0902n0:453: Pucchā – tattha āvuso uttaro māṇavo kathaṃ bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatataṃ attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:454_0: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante uttaro māṇavo “suppatiṭṭhitapādo kho pana so bhavaṃ gotamo,
anya-e0902n0:454_1: idampi tassa bhoto gotamassa mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavatī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:454_2: bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatataṃ attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa
anya-e0902n0:455: Pucchā – aparampi āvuso uttaro māṇavo bhagavato gamanakāle kīdisaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:456_0: Vissajjanā – aparampi bhante uttaro māṇavo bhagavato gamanakāle paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0902n0:456_1: pāduddharaṇādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:457: Pucchā – aparampi āvuso uttaro māṇavo bhagavato antaragharaṃ pavisanakāle kīdisaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:458_0: Vissajjanā – aparampi bhante uttaro māṇavo bhagavato antaragharaṃ pavisanakāle na
anya-e0902n0:458_1: kāyassa unnamanādikaṃ pāsādikaṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa
anya-e0902n0:459: Pucchā – aparampi āvuso uttaro māṇavo bhagavato bhojanakāle kīdisaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:460_0: Vissajjanā – aparampi bhante uttaro māṇavo bhagavato bhojanakāle pattodakādikaṃ paṭiggahaṇādikāle
anya-e0902n0:460_1: na pattassa unnamanādikaṃ bhagavato pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano
anya-e0902n0:461: Pucchā – aparampi āvuso uttaro māṇavo bhagavato bhuttāvikāle kīdisaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:462_0: Vissajjanā – aparampi bhante uttaro māṇavo bhagavato bhuttāvikāle pattodanādikaṃ
anya-e0902n0:462_1: paṭiggaṇhādikāle na pattassa unnamanādikaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā
anya-e0902n0:462_2: ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:463_0: Pucchā – aparampi āvuso uttaro māṇavo bhagavato cīvaradhāraṇe ca ārāmagatakāle ca
anya-e0902n0:463_1: dhammadesanākāle ca sabbairiyāpathesu ca kīdisaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā
anya-e0902n0:463_2: ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:464_0: Vissajjanā – aparampi bhante uttaro māṇavo bhagavato cīvaradhāraṇakāle ca ārāmagatakāle
anya-e0902n0:464_1: ca sabbesu ca iriyāpathesu na accukkaṭṭhādikaṃ pāsādikaṃ ākāraṃ disvā ca sallakkhetvā
anya-e0902n0:464_2: ca attano ācariyassa brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa sampaṭivedesi.
anya-e0902n0:465: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso brahmāyu brahmaṇo bhagavantaṃ pucchi, kathañcassa bhagavā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:466_0: Vissajjanā – “kathaṃ kho brāhmaṇo hoti, kathaṃ bhavati vedagū. Tevijjo bho kathaṃ
anya-e0902n0:466_1: hoti, sottiyo kinti vuccati. Arahaṃ bho kathaṃ hoti, kathaṃ bhavati kevalī. Muni
anya-e0902n0:466_2: ca bho kathaṃ hoti, buddho kinti pavuccatī”ti – evaṃ kho bhante brahmāyu brāhmaṇo
anya-e0902n0:469: Cittaṃ visuddhaṃ jānāti, muttaṃ rāgehi sabbaso;
anya-e0902n0:472: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa vibhajitvā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:473: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ sutvā brahmāyu brāhmaṇo bhagavati kīdisaṃ nipaccakāraṃ akāsi, kathañcassa bhagavā punapi anupubbiṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:474_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ sutvā brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā
anya-e0902n0:474_1: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena
anya-e0902n0:474_2: ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti “brahmāyu ahaṃ bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:474_3: brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ bho gotama brāhmaṇo”ti, evaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ akāsi, bhagavā
anya-e0902n0:474_4: ca bhante dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme
anya-e0902n0:474_5: ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi, evaṃ kho bhante brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:475: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dammadesanaṃ sutvā brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa kīdiso dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:476_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā brahmāyussa brāhmaṇassa tasmiṃyeva
anya-e0902n0:476_1: āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti.
anya-e0902n0:478: Pucchā – selasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:479_0: Vissajjanā – aṅguttarāpesu bhante āpaṇe nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigameselaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e0902n0:479_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Selo bhante brāhmaṇo sapariso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0902n0:479_2: sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:482: Narassa hi sujātassa, ye bhavanti viyañcanā;
anya-e0902n0:485: Pucchā – assalāyanasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:486_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante assalāyanaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, assalāyano
anya-e0902n0:486_1: bhante māṇavo mahatā brāhmaṇagaṇena saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā
anya-e0902n0:486_2: bho gotama evamāhaṃsu ‘brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo. Brāhmaṇova sukko
