anya-e0902n0:486_3: vaṇṇo, kaṇho añño vaṇṇo. Brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti, no abrāhmaṇā. Brāhmaṇāva brahmuno
anya-e0902n0:486_4: puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanimmitā brahmadāyādā’ti, idha bhavaṃ gotamo
anya-e0902n0:488: Pucchā – ghoṭamukhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:489_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante khemiyambavane ghoṭamukhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0902n0:489_1: udenena bhāsitaṃ. Ghoṭamukho bhante brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ udenaṃ caṅkamantaṃ anucaṅkamamāno
anya-e0902n0:489_2: evamāha “ambho samaṇa natthi dhammiko paribbajo, evaṃ me ettha hoti, tañca kho bhavantarūpānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:489_3: vā adassanā, yo vā panettha dhammā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:491: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena caṅkīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:492_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante opāsāde nāma kosalānaṃ nigame kāpaṭikaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0902n0:492_1: bhāsitaṃ, kāpaṭiko bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yadidaṃ bho gotama brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:492_2: porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ itihitihaparamparāya piṭakasampadāya, tattha ca brāhmaṇā ekaṃsena
anya-e0902n0:492_3: niṭṭhaṃ gacchanti ‘idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’nti, idha bhavaṃ gotamo kimāhā”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:494: Pucchā – esukārīsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:495_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante esukāriṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, esukārī bhante
anya-e0902n0:495_1: brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā bho gotama catasso pāricariyā
anya-e0902n0:495_2: paññapenti, brāhmaṇassa pāricariyaṃ paññapenti, khattiyassa pāricariyaṃ paññapenti,
anya-e0902n0:495_3: vessassa pāricariyaṃ paññapenti, suddassa pāricariyaṃ paññapentī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:497: Pucchā – dhanañjānisuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:498_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0902n0:498_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ, dhanañjāni bhante brāhmaṇo pamādavihāraṃ vihāsi, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:499: Pucchā – atha kho āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi, kathañca so āyasmato sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatissa ārocesi.
anya-e0902n0:500_0: Vissajjanā – “kaccāsi dhanañjāni appamatto”ti, evaṃ kho bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero
anya-e0902n0:500_1: dhammasenāpati dhanañjāniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi, dhanañjāni ca bhante brāhmaṇo “kuto
anya-e0902n0:500_2: bho sāriputta amhākaṃ appamādo, yesaṃ no mātāpitaro posetabbā”ti, evamādinā āyasmato
anya-e0902n0:501: Pucchā – evaṃ vutte kho āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa kīdisaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0902n0:502_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “taṃ kiṃ maññasi
anya-e0902n0:502_1: dhanañjāni, idhekacco mātāpitūnaṃ hetu adhammacārī visamacārī assa, tamenaṃ adhammacariyā
anya-e0902n0:502_2: visamacariyāhetu nirayaṃ nirayapālā upakaḍḍheyyu”nti, evamādinā dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0902n0:503: Pucchā – puna pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa aparenapi pariyāyena anusāsaniṃ adāsi.
anya-e0902n0:504_0: Vissajjanā – punapi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “taṃ kiṃ maññasi
anya-e0902n0:504_1: dhanañjāni, yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ hetu adhammacārī visamacārī assa, yo vā mātāpitūnaṃ
anya-e0902n0:504_2: hetu dhammacārī samacārī assa, katamaṃ seyyo”ti, evamādinā dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0902n0:505: Pucchā – aparabhāge pi āvuso āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati kathaṃ dhanañjānissa brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamaye dhammakathaṃ kathesi, kathañcassa abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:506_0: Vissajjanā – aparabhāge pi bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati dhanañjānissa
anya-e0902n0:506_1: brāhmaṇassa maraṇasamayepi cattāro brahmavihāre desesi, dhanañjāni ca bhante brāhmaṇo
anya-e0902n0:506_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
anya-e0902n0:508: Pucchā – vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:509: Vissajjanā – icchānaṅgale bhante vāseṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Vāseṭṭho bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi –
anya-e0902n0:514: Tesaṃ no jātivādasmiṃ, vivādo atthi gotama.
anya-e0902n0:515: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, bhāradvājo iti bhāsati;
anya-e0902n0:516: Ahañca kammunā brūmi, evaṃ jānāhi cakkhuma.
anya-e0902n0:517: Tena sakkoma ñāpetuṃ, aññaṃmaññaṃ mayaṃ ubho;
anya-e0902n0:519: Candaṃ yathā khayātītaṃ, pecca pañjalikā janā;
anya-e0902n0:521: Cakkhuṃ loke samuppannaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ;
anya-e0902n0:522: Jātiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, udāhu bhavati kammunā;
anya-e0902n0:523: Ajānataṃ no pabrūhi, yathā jānemu brāhmaṇanti.
anya-e0902n0:526: Pucchā – subhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:527_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Subho
anya-e0902n0:527_1: bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “brāhmaṇā bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:527_2: evamāhaṃsu’ gahaṭṭho ārādhako hoti ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalaṃ, na pabbajito ārādhako hoti
anya-e0902n0:527_3: ñāyaṃ dhammaṃ kusalanti, idha bhavaṃ gotamo kimāhā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:528: Pucchā – puna pi āvuso subho māṇavo todeyyaputto kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi, kathañca bhagavā vibhajja byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:529_0: Vissajjanā – “brāhmaṇā bho gotama evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaṭṭhamidaṃ mahākiccaṃ mahādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0902n0:529_1: mahāsamārambhaṃ, gharāvāsakammaṭṭhānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti. Appaṭṭhamidaṃ appakiccaṃ
anya-e0902n0:529_2: appādhikaraṇaṃ appasamārambhaṃ, pabbajjā kammaṭṭhānaṃ appaphalaṃ hotī’ti. Idha bhavaṃ
anya-e0902n0:529_3: gotamo kimāhā”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante subho māṇavo todeyyaputto punapi bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0902n0:529_4: Bhagavā ca bhante “etthāpi kho ahaṃ māṇava vibhajjavādā, nāhamettha ekaṃsavādoti”
anya-e0902n0:531: Pucchā – saṅgāravasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:532_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante cañcalikappe nāma gāme saṅgāravaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:532_1: saṅgāravo bhante māṇavo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “santi kho bho gotama eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0902n0:532_2: diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānanti. Tatra bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:532_3: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhadhammābhiññāvosānapāramippattā ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānanti,
anya-e0902n0:532_4: tesaṃ bhavaṃ gotamo katamo”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:534: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena devadahasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:535: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante devadahe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame samma hule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:537: Pucchā – pañcattayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:538: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:540: Pucchā – kintisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:541: Vissajjanā – pisinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe nāma vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:542: Pucchā – tattha āvuso bhagavā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū paṭipucchitvā ovādamadāsi, yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:543_0: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante bhagavā “kinti vo bhikkhave mayi hoti, cīvarahetu vā samaṇo
anya-e0902n0:543_1: gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā, senāsanahetu vā, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo
anya-e0902n0:543_2: gotamo dhammaṃ desetī”ti bhikkhū pucchitvā “tasmātiha bhikkhave ye vo mayā dhammā
anya-e0902n0:543_3: abhiññā desitā. Seyyathidaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā
anya-e0902n0:543_4: pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Tattha sabbeheva
anya-e0902n0:543_5: samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ” evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:544: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha dutiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi. Yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:545_0: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante bhagavā “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:545_1: avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti, siyā vītikkamo. Tatra
anya-e0902n0:545_2: bhikkhave na codanāya taritabbaṃ puggalo upaparikkhitabbo”ti evamādinā bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0902n0:546: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi, yo bahujanassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0902n0:547_0: Vissajjanā – “tesañca vo bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ
anya-e0902n0:547_1: aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppajjeyya diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhī”ti
anya-e0902n0:547_2: evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha tatiyampi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0902n0:548: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhikkhunā evaṃ satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā āyasmā nu te bhikkhu akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetīti parehi puṭṭhena kathaṃ sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:549_0: Vissajjanā – “idhāhaṃ āvuso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃ, tassa me bhagavā dhammaṃ
anya-e0902n0:549_1: desesi, tāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsiṃ, taṃ te bhikkhū dhammaṃ sutvā
anya-e0902n0:549_2: akusalā vuṭṭhahiṃsu kusale patiṭṭhahiṃsū”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante tena bhikkhunā evaṃ
anya-e0902n0:549_3: satthu ovādānusāsanikārinā parehi puṭṭhena sammā byākaramānena byākātabbaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:551: Pucchā – sāmagāmasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:552_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante sāmagāme nāma sakyānaṃ nigame āyasmantañca ānandaṃ āyasmantañca
anya-e0902n0:552_1: cundaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā ca bhante ānando āyasmā ca cundo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamisu,
anya-e0902n0:552_2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho
anya-e0902n0:552_3: āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘nigaṇṭho
anya-e0902n0:552_4: bhante nāṭaputto pāvāyaṃ adhunā kālaṅkato, tassa kālaṅkiriyāya bhinnā nigaṇṭhā dvedhikajātā
anya-e0902n0:552_5: bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti…pe…
anya-e0902n0:552_6: bhinnathūpe appaṭisaraṇe’ti. Tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti ‘māheva bhagavato accayena
anya-e0902n0:552_7: saṅghe vivādo uppajji, svāssa vivādo bahujanaahitāya bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa
anya-e0902n0:552_8: anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussāna’nti”. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:554: Pucchā – sunakkhattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:555_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sunakkhattaṃ licchaviputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sunakkhatto
anya-e0902n0:555_1: bhante licchaviputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bhante sambahulehi
anya-e0902n0:555_2: kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:555_3: kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmāti. Kacci te bhante bhikkhū sammadeva
anya-e0902n0:555_4: aññaṃ byākaṃsu, udāhu santetthekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṃ byākaṃsū”ti, tasmiṃ
anya-e0902n0:557: Pucchā – āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:558: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:560: Pucchā – gaṇakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:561_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante gaṇakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, gaṇakamoggallāno
anya-e0902n0:561_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “seyyāthāpi bho gotama imassa
anya-e0902n0:561_2: migāramātupāsādassa dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṃ
anya-e0902n0:561_3: yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā…pe… sakkā nukho bho gotama imasmimpi dhammavinaye evameva
anya-e0902n0:561_4: anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetu”nti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:562: Pucchā – evaṃ vutte kho āvuso gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ kiṃ avoca, kathañcassa bhagavā byākāsi.
anya-e0902n0:563_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte bhante gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ
anya-e0902n0:563_1: nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakā bhotā gotamena evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā
anya-e0902n0:563_2: sabbe accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārodhenti, udāhu ekacce nārādhentī”ti, bhagavā ca
anya-e0902n0:563_3: bhante “appekacce kho brāhmaṇa mama sāvakā mayā evaṃ ovadīyamānā evaṃ anusāsīyamānā
anya-e0902n0:563_4: accantaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhenti, ekacce nārādhentī”ti evamādinā gaṇakamoggallānassa
anya-e0902n0:564: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇako moggallāno imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0902n0:565_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo “ye
anya-e0902n0:565_1: me bho gotama puggalā asaddhā jīvikatthā na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti
anya-e0902n0:567: Pucchā – gopakamoggallānasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:568_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante gopakamoggallānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0902n0:568_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ, gopakamoggallāno bhante brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ
anya-e0902n0:568_2: etadavoca “atthi nu kho bho ānanda ekabhikkhupi tehi dhammehi sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā
anya-e0902n0:568_3: sabbaṃ samannāgato, yehi dhammehi samannāgato so bhavaṃ gotamo ahosi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti,
anya-e0902n0:569_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhikkhuno
anya-e0902n0:569_1: pasādanīyā dhammā pakāsitā, ye tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
anya-e0902n0:569_2: akkhātā. Yehi ca samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ
anya-e0902n0:569_3: pūjeyyuṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0902n0:570_0: Vissajjanā – idha brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati
anya-e0902n0:570_1: ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
anya-e0902n0:570_2: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, yeme dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā
anya-e0902n0:570_3: sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpassa
anya-e0902n0:570_4: dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti
anya-e0902n0:570_5: evamādinā bhante tattha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena dasa pasādanīyā
anya-e0902n0:570_6: dhammā pakāsitā. Ye tena bhagatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena akkhātā,
anya-e0902n0:570_7: yehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ etarahi bhikkhū sakkareyyuṃ garuṃ kareyyuṃ māneyyuṃ pūjeyyuṃ
anya-e0902n0:571_0: Pucchā – evaṃ vutte kho āvuso vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto kīdisaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:571_1: kathesi, kathañcassa āyasmā ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:572_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto upanandaṃ senāpatiṃ āmantesi
anya-e0902n0:572_1: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhavaṃ senāpati, yadi me bhonto sakkātabbaṃ sakkaronti, garuṃ kātabbaṃ
anya-e0902n0:572_2: garuṃ karonti, mānetabbaṃ mānenti, pūjetabbaṃ pūjentī”ti evamādikaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ
anya-e0902n0:572_3: kathesi, āyasmā ca bhante ānando “na ca kho brāhmaṇa so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ vaṇṇesi,
anya-e0902n0:572_4: napi so bhagavā sabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vaṇṇesī”ti evamādinā taṃ vacanaṃ paṭisodhetvā pakāsesi.
anya-e0902n0:574: Pucchā – mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:575: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhānīyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghattheraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0902n0:576_0: Saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhānīyabhikkhūnaṃ saṅghatthero bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ
anya-e0902n0:576_1: katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “puccheyyāhaṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:576_2: bhagavantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ, sace me bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti,
anya-e0902n0:578: Pucchā – cūḷapuṇṇamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:579: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:580: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā asappurisaaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:581_0: Vissajjanā – asappuriso bhikkhave assaddhammasamannāgato hoti, asappurisabhatti hoti,
anya-e0902n0:581_1: asappurisacintī hoti, asappurisamantī hoti, asappurisavāco hoti, asappurisakammanto
anya-e0902n0:581_2: hoti, asappurisadiṭṭhi hoti, asappurisadānaṃ detīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:582: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā tattha sappurisaaṅgāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:583_0: Vissajjanā – sappuriso bhikkhave saddhammasamannāgato hoti, sappurisabhatti hoti,
anya-e0902n0:583_1: sappurisacintī hoti, sappurisamantī hoti, sappurisavāco hoti, sappurisakammanto hoti,
anya-e0902n0:583_2: sappurisadiṭṭhi hoti, sappurisadānaṃ detīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha aṭṭhavidhāni
anya-e0902n0:585: Pucchā – anupadasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:586_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0902n0:586_1: bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa sabhāgā tasmiṃ samaye sannipatiṃsu,
anya-e0902n0:587: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa anupadadhammavipassanā vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:588_0: Vissajjanā – paṇḍito bhikkhave sāriputto mahāpañño bhikkhave sāriputto puthupañño
anya-e0902n0:588_1: bhikkhave sāriputto hāsapañño bhikkhave sāriputto tikkhapañño bhikkhave sāriputto
anya-e0902n0:588_2: javanapañño bhikkhave sāriputto nibbedhikapañño bhikkhave sāriputto sāriputto bhikkhave
anya-e0902n0:588_3: aḍḍhamāsaṃ anupadadhammavipassanaṃ vipassatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:588_4: āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammasenāpatissa anupadadhammavipassanā vitthārena pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:590: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena chabbisodhanasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:591: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:593: Pucchā – sappurisasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:594: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:596: Pucchā – sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:597: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:599: Pucchā – bahudhātukasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:600: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:602: Pucchā – isigilisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:603: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante isigilismiṃ pabbate sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:605: Pucchā – mahācattārīsakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:606: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:608: Pucchā – ānāpānassatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:609_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, therā bhante
anya-e0902n0:609_1: bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū
anya-e0902n0:609_2: ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
anya-e0902n0:609_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṃsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, appekacce therā bhikkhū
anya-e0902n0:609_4: cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti, te ca bhante navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi
anya-e0902n0:609_5: ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānanti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:611: Pucchā – kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:612_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:612_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:612_2: sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarakathā udapādi “acchariyaṃ āvuso, abbhutaṃ āvuso, yāvañcidaṃ
anya-e0902n0:612_3: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā
anya-e0902n0:612_4: mahapphalā vuttā mahānisaṃsā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:614: Pucchā – saṅkhārūpapattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:615: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:616: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:617_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhikkhave bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena samannāgato
anya-e0902n0:617_1: hoti, sutena samannāgato hoti, cāgena samannāgato hoti, paññāya samannāgato hoti,
anya-e0902n0:617_2: tassa evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ
anya-e0902n0:617_3: upapajjeyya”nti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā saṅkhārūpapattiyo vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:619: Pucchā – cūḷasuññatasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:620_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0902n0:620_1: ānando sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ekamidaṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:620_2: samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati nagarakaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo, tattha me bhante
anya-e0902n0:620_3: bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ, suññatāvihārenāhaṃ ānanda etarahi
anya-e0902n0:620_4: bahulaṃ viharāmīti kacci metaṃ bhante sussutaṃ suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhārita”nti,
anya-e0902n0:622: Pucchā – mahāsuññatasuttaṃ panāvuto bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:623_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0902n0:623_1: āyasmā bhante ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ghaṭāya sakkassa vihāre cīvarakammaṃ
anya-e0902n0:625: Pucchā – acchariyaabbhutasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:626_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0902n0:626_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0902n0:626_3: udapādi “acchariyaṃ āvuso, abbhutaṃ āvuso tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
anya-e0902n0:626_4: Yatra hi nāma tathāgato atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe
anya-e0902n0:626_5: sabbadukkhavītivatte jānissati. Evaṃjaccā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃnāmā te
anya-e0902n0:626_6: bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃgottā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃsīlā te bhagavanto
anya-e0902n0:626_7: ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃpaññā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ
anya-e0902n0:626_8: itipi, evaṃvihārī te bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipi, evaṃvimuttā te bhagavanto ahesuṃ itipī”ti,
anya-e0902n0:628: Pucchā – bākulasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:629: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā bākulattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:631: Pucchā – dantabhūmisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:632_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Jayaseno bhante
anya-e0902n0:632_1: rājakumāro aciravataṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho aggivessana
anya-e0902n0:632_2: idha bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggata”nti,
anya-e0902n0:633: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā dhammadesanānayo pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:634_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kutettha aggivessana labbhā, yaṃ taṃ nekkhammena ñātabbaṃ nekkhammena
anya-e0902n0:634_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ nekkhammena pattabbaṃ nekkhammena sacchikātabbaṃ, taṃ vata jayaseno rājakumāro
anya-e0902n0:634_2: kāmamajjhe vasanto kāme paribhuñjanto kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno
anya-e0902n0:634_3: kāmapariyosanāya ussuko ussati vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:634_4: vijjatīti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa samassāsetvā, seyyathāpissu
anya-e0902n0:634_5: aggivessana dve hatthidammā vā assadammāvā godammā vā sudantā suvinītāti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:634_6: bhante bhagavatā aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa desanānayo pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:635: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā dve upamāyo dassetvā tatuttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍheti.
anya-e0902n0:636: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi aggivessana rājākhattiyo muddhāvasitto nāgavanikaṃ āmantetīti evamādinā bhante bhagavā uttaripi dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhesi.
anya-e0902n0:638: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhūmijasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:639_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jayasenaṃ rājakumāraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, jayaseno bhante
anya-e0902n0:639_1: rājakumāro āyasmantaṃ bhūmijaṃ etadavoca “santi bho bhūmija eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino
anya-e0902n0:639_2: evaṃdiṭṭhino ‘āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0902n0:639_3: Anāsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya. Āsañca anāsañcepi
anya-e0902n0:639_4: karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāya. Nevāsaṃ nānāsañcepi karitvā
anya-e0902n0:639_5: brahmacariyaṃ caranti, ābhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā’ti. Idha bhoto bhūmijassa satthā
anya-e0902n0:639_6: kiṃvādī kimakkhāyī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:640: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijattherassa taṃ byākaraṇaṃ samanujānitvā tatuttari dhammadesanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:641_0: Vissajjanā – taggha tvaṃ bhūmija evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākaramāno vuttavādī ceva me hosi,
anya-e0902n0:641_1: na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhasi, evamādinā bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa
anya-e0902n0:641_2: taṃ vacanaṃ samanujānitvā “yehi kehici bhūmija samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā micchādiṭṭhino
anya-e0902n0:641_3: micchāsaṅkappā micchāvācā micchākammantā micchāājīvā micchāvāyāmā micchāsatī micchāsamādhino,
anya-e0902n0:641_4: te āsañcepi karitvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti, abhabbā phalassa adhigamāyā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:641_5: bhante bhagavatā āyasmato bhūmijassa uttari desanānayo paripūretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0902n0:643: Pucchā – anuruddhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:644_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena
anya-e0902n0:644_1: bhāsitaṃ, pañcakaṅgo bhante thapati āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca “idha maṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:644_2: therā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu ‘appamāṇaṃ gahapati cetovimuttiṃ bhāvehī’ti,
anya-e0902n0:644_3: ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu ‘mahaggataṃ gahapati cetovimuttiṃ bhāvehī”ti, yā cāyaṃ bhante
anya-e0902n0:644_4: appamāṇā cetovimutti yā ca mahaggatā cetovimutti, ime dhammā nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā
anya-e0902n0:644_5: ca, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nānanti” tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:646: Pucchā – upakkilesasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:647: Vissajjanā – pācīnavaṃsadāye bhante āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:649: Pucchā – bālapaṇḍitasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:650: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:651: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhadomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:652_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n0:652_1: Katamāni tīṇi. Idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī
anya-e0902n0:652_2: cāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni ca bālassa diṭṭheva
anya-e0902n0:653: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa samparāyo ca tattha niraye bālassa dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:654_0: Vissajjanā – sa kho so bhikkhave bālo kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ
anya-e0902n0:654_1: caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedāparaṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
anya-e0902n0:654_2: nirayaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa samparāyo ca tattha
anya-e0902n0:655: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ dukkhadomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:656_0: Vissajjanā – santi bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā tiṇabhakkhā te allānipi tiṇāni sukkhānipi
anya-e0902n0:656_1: tiṇāni dantullehakaṃ khādantīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa tiracchānayoniyaṃ
anya-e0902n0:657: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattadullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:658_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso ekacchiggalaṃ yugaṃ mahāsamudde pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0902n0:658_1: tamenaṃ puratthimo vāto pacchimena saṃhareyyāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0902n0:658_2: bālena sakiṃ vinipātagatena puna manussattassa dullabhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:659: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:660_0: Vissajjanā – sa kho so bhikkhave bālo sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e0902n0:660_1: manussattaṃ āgacchatīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā bālassa kadāci karahaci
anya-e0902n0:660_2: dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi dukkhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:661: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca paṇḍitassa diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:662_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
anya-e0902n0:662_1: Katamāni tīṇi. Idha bhikkhave paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī ca sukatakammakārī
anya-e0902n0:663: Paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni ca diṭṭheva dhamme paṇḍitassa sukhasomanassapaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:664: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca tattha sagge sukhasomanassappaṭisaṃvedanā ca pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:665_0: Vissajjanā – sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito kāyena sucaritaṃ caritvā vācāya manasā sucaritaṃ
anya-e0902n0:665_1: caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:665_2: tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa samparāyo ca sagge ca paṇḍitassa sukhasomanassappanisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:666: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi sukhabahulatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0902n0:667_0: Vissajjanā – sa kho so bhikkhave paṇḍito sace kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e0902n0:667_1: manussattaṃ āgacchati, yāni tāni uccākulāni khattiyamahāsālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulaṃ
anya-e0902n0:667_2: vā gahapatimahāsālakulaṃ vā tathārūpe kule paccājāyatīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0902n0:667_3: bhagavatā paṇḍitassa kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena manussattaṃ āgatassapi
anya-e0902n0:669: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:670_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Subho
anya-e0902n0:670_1: bhante māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:670_2: hetu ko paccayo, yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā.
anya-e0902n0:670_3: Dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā, dissanti dīghāyukā. Dissanti bavhābādhā,
anya-e0902n0:670_4: dissanti appābādhā. Dissanti dubbaṇṇā, dissanti vaṇṇavanto. Dissanti appesakkhā,
anya-e0902n0:670_5: dissanti mahesakkhā. Dissanti appabhogā, dissanti mahābhogā. Dissanti nīcakulīnā,
anya-e0902n0:670_6: dissanti uccākulīnā. Dissanti duppaññā, dissanti paññavanto. Ko nu kho bho gotama
anya-e0902n0:670_7: hetu ko paccayo, yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā”ti
anya-e0902n0:671: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ dīghāyukaappāyukasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:672_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā pāṇātipātī hoti, luddo lohitapāṇi
anya-e0902n0:672_1: hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesūti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā appāyukadīghāyukasaṃvattanakāni
anya-e0902n0:673: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appābādhabavhābādhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:674_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā sattānaṃ viheṭṭhakajātiko hoti
anya-e0902n0:674_1: pāṇinā vā leḍḍunāvā daṇḍenavā satthena vāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ
anya-e0902n0:675: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:676_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo, appampi
anya-e0902n0:676_1: vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhiyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca
anya-e0902n0:676_2: pātukarotīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇasaṃvattanakakammāni
anya-e0902n0:677: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahesakkha appesakkhasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:678_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā issāmanako hoti, paralābhasakkāra
anya-e0902n0:678_1: garukāra mānanavandana pūjāsu issati upadussati issaṃ bandhatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:678_2: tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ appesakkhamahesakkhasaṃvattanakāni kammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:679: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:680_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā na dātā hoti, samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0902n0:680_1: vā annaṃ pānaṃ vattaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandha vilepanaṃ seyyavasathapadīpeyyanti evamādinā
anya-e0902n0:680_2: bhante tattha bhagavatā mahābhogaappabhogasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:681: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna nīcakulīnasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:682_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā thaddho hoti atimāni abhivādetabbaṃ
anya-e0902n0:682_1: na abhivādeti, paccuṭṭhātabbaṃ na paccuṭṭheti, āsanārahassa na āsanaṃ deti, maggārahassa
anya-e0902n0:682_2: na maggaṃ deti, sakkātabbaṃ na sakkaroti, garukātabbaṃ na garukaroti, mānetabbaṃ
anya-e0902n0:682_3: māneti, pūjetabbaṃ na pūjetīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ uccākulīna
anya-e0902n0:683: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahāpaññaduppaññasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:684_0: Vissajjanā – idha māṇava ekacco itthī vā puriso vā samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0902n0:684_1: na paripucchitā hoti “kiṃ bhante kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusalaṃ. Kiṃ sāvajjaṃ, kiṃ anavajjaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:684_2: Kiṃ sevitabbaṃ, kiṃ na sevitabbaṃ. Kiṃ me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya
anya-e0902n0:684_3: hoti, kiṃ vā pana me karīyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotī”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0902n0:684_4: tattha bhagavatā sattānaṃ mahāpaññaduppaññasaṃvattanakakammāni vibhajitvā pakāsitāni.
anya-e0902n0:686: Pucchā – indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0902n0:687_0: Vissajjanā – gajaṅgalāyaṃ bhante uttaraṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pārāsiviyantevāsiṃ ārabbha
anya-e0902n0:687_1: bhāsitaṃ, uttaro bhante māṇavo pārāsiviyantevāsī bhagavatā puṭṭho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0902n0:687_2: “idha bho gotama cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passati, sotena saddaṃ na suṇāti. Evaṃ kho bho
anya-e0902n0:687_3: gotama deseti pārāsiviyo brāhmaṇo sāvakānaṃ indriyabhāvana”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
